categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Neebo was a female Jedi Master in the Jedi Order during the waning decades of the Galactic Republic. Neebo's lightsaber was later found by Jedi Master Kit Fisto in the castle of General Grievous, a well known Jedi killer.

Jedi Master Neebo was a Force-sensitive female who lived during the last decades of the Galactic Republic. Joining the Jedi Order and eventually reaching the rank of Jedi Master, Neebo went on a mission to protect refugees on the moons of the planet Sanjin, sometime before fellow Jedi Master Kit Fisto's mission to the third moon of Vassek. Neebo went missing during the conflict, and Fisto later found her lightsaber in the trophy room of the Confederate cyborg Grievous—who often collected the weapons of Jedi he had killed—during his infiltration of the General's castle on the third moon of Vassek. Fisto examined Neebo's weapon and then went on to duel Grievous.
Neebo was a Force-sensitive Jedi Master. In combat, she wielded a lightsaber.

Neebo was first referenced in the episode guide for "Lair of Grievous", part of the first season of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series, which aired on December 12, 2008. Although the storyline suggests that the Jedi Master was killed by Grievous, this has not been confirmed.
